page.title: 16COMMUNITY GROUPS IN EDDERTON
page.content: {Edderton Community Council}is made up of 10 people,over 18,elected by the village.They bring to the attention of the local councillor,local officials etc. anything concerning the village in the way of upkeep of roads,street lighting and many other services.There is usually one meeting every six weeks held at the local hall where anything affecting the village is discussed.The biggest topic at the moment is the replacement of the village hall.They are given money from the Regional Council to finance the running of the group.{Edderton Community Association is a group of people interested in organising activities for the village such as sales of work,car treasure hunts,concerts which raises money to fund Christmas parties for senior citizens and children.They meet once a month to plan the events.
